title: 求助，让刷石机刷出其它的矿石的模组，1.7.10的
author: ksqeib445
txt_content:
一定要mod吗，我有插件。只是配置有点麻烦[CustonOreGen
还有我写的配置#You can create generators as much as you want.
#Important: All generators should be named "generator1", "generator2", etc. 
#You can define the spawnrates of any block in the blocks-section.
#The spawnrates are in percent, for example 57.3 are 57,3%.
#All values together should be 100%. If all values together are higher or lower as 100, the plugin would'nt work correctly.
#The permissions are custom, so you can make a generator for VIPS, and give them the permission "oregen.vip".
#Are you finish with configuring? Just type /customoregen to reload the plugin!

#Note: If the Island's owner is offline, the cobblestone generator would be choose the first Generator-Config.

generators:
  generator1:
    #default generator
    blocks:
    #Please use Bukkit-Blocknames. List: https://hub.spigotmc.org/javadocs/bukkit/org/bukkit/Material.html
    - STONE:30.0
    - SANDSTONE:19.0
    - IRON_ORE:10.0
    - GOLD_ORE:6.0
    - COAL_ORE:10.0
    - DIAMOND_ORE:3.0
    - REDSTONE_ORE:4.0
    - EMERALD_ORE:3.0
    - LAPIS_ORE:4.0
    - QUARTZ_ORE:3.0
    - CLAY:3.0
    - SOUL_SAND:2.0
    - DIRT:3.0
    permission: ''
  generator2:
    #vip generator, VIPS need generators.vip permission
    blocks:
    - STONE:1.0
    - SANDSTONE:9.0
    - IRON_ORE:25.0
    - GOLD_ORE:11.0
    - COAL_ORE:10.0
    - DIAMOND_ORE:8.0
    - REDSTONE_ORE:4.0
    - EMERALD_ORE:8.0
    - LAPIS_ORE:7.0
    - QUARTZ_ORE:3.0
    - CLAY:3.0
    - SOUL_SAND:5.0
    - DIRT:6.0
    permission: 'oregen.vip'
复制代码
刷的列表有:石头，沙石，各种矿石，泥土[空岛嘛，泥土很少的]，灵魂沙【空岛嘛……】

replies.txt_content:
标题: 求助，让刷石机刷出其它的矿石的模组，1.7.10的最近和朋友玩空岛，但弄来弄去就只刷原石
在mcbbs中搜了一下
发现了
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=230482
以及
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=526999
刚开始好开心，
但lz我打开链接，为毛都没有1.7.10的


所以，求一个1.7.10的可以刷矿的模组

replies.author: ksqeib445
replies.txt_content: 一定要mod吗，我有插件。只是配置有点麻烦[CustonOreGen

replies.author: ksqeib445
replies.txt_content:

刷的列表有:石头，沙石，各种矿石，泥土[空岛嘛，泥土很少的]，灵魂沙【空岛嘛……】 ...
楼主要是不会翻墙，我还提供下载,CustomOreGen
